section.title: Implementing Servers: Overview
section.para: This library may be used to create UPnP or DLNA servers via its RygelMediaServer class.
The RygelMediaServer reference documentation and this example explains how to implement a server.

section.title: Implementing Servers: Simple Example
section.para: This example program shows how to fill a container with media items and then instantiate a server to serve them.
